ygData.subject: Re: Fear and level 16 spell questions
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, I agree that it has it s uses, but it sure would be nice if it was LIFO instead of FIFO. (Those 2 acronyms will separate the programmers from the
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, I agree that it has it's uses, but it sure would be nice if it was LIFO
instead of FIFO.

(Those 2 acronyms will separate the programmers from the non-programmers..
hehe)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Tim Borelli [SMTP:timb@...]
> Sent: Thursday, July 01, 1999 9:31 AM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Fear and level 16 spell questions
>
> From: Tim Borelli <timb@...>
>
> less of a waste than you think... cancel magic will also work on a MOB...
> so if they have fireshield on, or SoW, you can remove it from them... and
> the spell that removes all enchantments (spells) from you is VERY good
> when
> fighting a creature that charms (NPCs can charm ya know...). imagine your
> 30th level monk getting charmed and coming at you... root and strip him of
> all enchantments, he isnt charmed anymore... and you life is saved =)
>
> Qorona Mindbender of the Volition Guild, 25th lvl enchanter on Cazic-Thule
>
> >
> >So to get rid of that DoT I will have to get rid of all of my buffs too?
> >
> >What a waste of a spell...
> >
>
> -------------------
> tim borrelli
